text: Light blue is a color. It is a shade of blue. Technically, it is not a shade of that color. It is instead a shade of cyan. Sky blue is a color similar to light blue. The first use of light blue as a color name in English was in 1915. == Crayola light blue == Crayola light blue is the color that is called "light blue" in Crayola crayons. It was only available in 1958. Category:Shades of blue Category:Shades of cyan
title: Light blue
